# About

I am a postdoctoral researcher at [AgroParisTech](https://www.agroparistech.fr) in the Centre for International Research on Environment and Development ([CIRED](https://www.centre-cired.fr)).  

This [CLAND](https://cland.lsce.ipsl.fr)-funded position, supervised by [Thierry Brunelle](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=70WNvUcAAAAJ&hl=fr), aims to analyze maize intensification in Kenya and sub-Saharan Africa.  

I defended my PhD thesis, supervised by [Alain Desdoigts](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=6c8QzJwAAAAJ&hl=fr), in July 2025 at [Paris 1 Panth√©on-Sorbonne University](https://www.pantheonsorbonne.fr/).

From 2023 to 2025, I was a teaching fellow (ATER) in the Department of Economics at [Sciences Po Paris](https://www.sciencespo.fr/fr/).

My research interests are primarily in development and agricultural economics.
